abstracts.cdata!:
The principal components of the project
            comprise: (i) construction of water supply and sewerage
            facilities in the Kingston area, including engineering and
            design studies; (ii) studies relating to a next phase water
            resources development, water user allocation and storage;
            and (iii) technical assistance to strengthen the Commission.
